StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_AddRecruiter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FirstName varchar(20), @MiddleName varchar(20) = NULL, @LastName varchar(20), @Su.x varchar(5) = NULL, @SSN char(9), @OrgID int, @Rank varchar(10), @Recrui.ngRole char(2), @MOS varchar(4) = NULL, @TourBeginDate date.me = NULL, @TourEndDate date.me = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15), @RecruiterID int = 0 OUTPUT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100) DECLARE @TranType varchar(8)
--- DECLARE @TourBeginDate date.me DECLARE @PayGrade varchar(3) DECLARE @Deleted char(1) DECLARE @BilletBeginDate date.me DECLARE @IsAssigned char(1) DECLARE @OnProduc.on char(1) DECLARE @PresentMCC varchar(3)
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
------------------------------------------------------ --- ADD PERSON RECORD AND SET THE RECRUITER ID ------------------------------------------------------ EXEC sp_UpdatePerson @PersonID = 0, @SocialSecurityNumber = @SSN, @FirstName = @FirstName, @LegalMiddleName = @MiddleName, @LastName = @LastName, @Su.xCD = @Su.x, @UserLogin = @UserLogin, @ID = @RecruiterID OUTPUT
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN RAISERROR ('An error occurred adding the recruiter''s person record.', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
------------------------------------------------------ --- ADD MARINE RECORD ------------------------------------------------------
--- GET MCC CODE SELECT @PresentMCC = MCC_CODE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID
--- DEFINE PAY GRADE SELECT @PayGrade = COALESCE((SELECT TOP 1 PAY_GRADE_CODE FROM PAY_GRADE WHERE RANK_CODE = @Rank ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE ASC), SPACE(0))
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MARINE WHERE MARINE_ID = @RecruiterID) BEGIN --- UPDATE MARINE RECORD SET @TranType = 'upda.ng'
UPDATE MARINE SET PRESENT_MONITORED_COMMAND_CODE = @PresentMCC, PRESENT_GRADE_CODE = @PayGrade, BILLET_MOS = @MOS, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_ID = @RecruiterID END ELSE BEGIN --- ADD MARINE RECORD SET @TranType = 'adding'
INSERT INTO MARINE (MARINE_ID, PRESENT_GRADE_CODE, PRESENT_MONITORED_COMMAND_CODE, BILLET_MOS, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@RecruiterID, @PayGrade, @PresentMCC, @MOS, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred ' + @TranType + ' the recruiter''s marine record.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 2, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
------------------------------------------------------ --- ADD RECRUITER RECORD ------------------------------------------------------ --- DEFINE DEFAULT VALUES SELECT @Deleted = 'N', @TourBeginDate = COALESCE(@TourBeginDate, GETDATE()), @BilletBeginDate = COALESCE(@TourBeginDate, GETDATE()), @IsAssigned = 'N', @OnProduc.on = 'N'
INSERT INTO RECRUITING_PERSON (RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, RECRUITING_ROLE_ID, RANK_CODE, PAY_GRADE_CODE, DELETED, TOUR_BEGIN_DATE, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE, IS_ASSIGNED, ON_PRODUCTION, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE, MANUAL_ADD) VALUES (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Recrui.ngRole, @Rank, @PayGrade, @Deleted, @TourBeginDate, @BilletBeginDate, @IsAssigned, @OnProduc.on, @UserLogin, GETDATE(), 1)
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN RAISERROR ('An error occurred adding the recruiter''s recrui.ng person record.', 16, 3, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
------------------------------------------------------ --- ADD BILLET INFO ------------------------------------------------------ EXEC sp_UpdatePersonnelBillet @RecruiterID, @Recrui.ngRole, @BilletBeginDate, @UserLogin
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN RAISERROR ('An error occurred adding the recruiter''s billet.', 16, 4, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
